tool_description: Creates various plots and charts for geochemical data visualization including scatter plots, histograms, ternary diagrams, and geochemical classification diagrams.

sample_ids.description: Array of sample IDs to visualize

plot_type.description: Type of plot: scatter, histogram, box_plot, ternary, classification, or multi_element

y_axis_parameter.description: Parameter for y-axis (required for scatter and classification plots)

color_by_parameter.description: Parameter to use for color coding points

error_messages: Insufficient data: At least 2 samples are required for visualization.
Invalid plot_type: Use one of [scatter, histogram, box_plot, ternary, classification, multi_element].
Missing y_axis_parameter: Y-axis parameter is required for scatter and classification plots.
Parameter not found: The specified parameter does not exist in the sample data.
Incompatible parameters: The selected parameters cannot be plotted together.
usage: Provide sample_ids, plot_type, and x_axis_parameter; for scatter plots also provide y_axis_parameter; optionally set color_by_parameter for enhanced visualization.

axis_ranges.description: Min and max values for each axis

interpretation_notes.description: Basic interpretation of patterns visible in the plot
